alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:47PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 745 PM MST... At 647 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scottsdale, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Carefree, McDowell Mountain Park, Scottsdale Airport, Desert Ridge Marketplace, Rio Verde, and Fort McDowell. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 188 and 190. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 32 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
